content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 20}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a spruce_pressure_plate, I first need to craft spruce_planks, which requires 1 spruce_log. I will move the spruce_log at slot 26 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 20}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the spruce_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 20}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have the spruce_planks, I need to place 1 of them in the crafting grid at slot 1 to craft the spruce_pressure_plate.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 20}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have the spruce_planks, I need to place 1 of them in the crafting grid at slot 2 to craft the spruce_pressure_plate.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 20}, {"type": "iron_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 29, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the spruce_pressure_plate by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
